duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and retail sales support to meet or exceed customer service goals.
Use suggestive selling techniques and meet solicitation goals for the Belk credit Rewards program.
Stay informed about store assortment, digital technology, and inventory available at other stores and on belk.com.
Utilize digital technology such as mobile devices and computer-based Point-of-Sale to enhance the customer shopping experience.
Meet or exceed personal sales goals, increase units sold per transaction, and reduce shrinkage in the area.
Maintain store standards, professional dress, and appearance, including floor and stock areas.
Support operations and assist with non-sell duties as assigned by the Sales Team Manager.
No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred. Ability to use and learn industry technology preferred.
Physical requirements include using business equipment, hand manipulation, and lifting 25-50 pound boxes.
For reasonable accommodation information, refer to the Belk Associate Handbook for policy and procedures.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred
